verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to thee that <S%H7703>destroyest<s%>, and thou wast not <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>; and dealest <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and they dealt not <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H8552>thee<s%>! When thou hast ceased to <S%H7703>destroy<s%>, thou shalt be <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>; and when thou hast made an <S%H5239>end<s%> of dealing <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, they shall deal treacherously with <S%H898>thee<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H6960>us<s%>; we have waited for <S%H2220>thee<s%>: be thou our arm every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, our <S%H3444>salvation<s%> also in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H5074>fled<s%>; at the lifting <S%H7427>up<s%> of thyself the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H5310>scattered<s%>.
And your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> as the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H625>gathereth<s%>: as <S%H1357>locusts<s%> <S%H4944>leap<s%> shall men leap upon <S%H8264>it<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H7682>exalted<s%>; for he <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>: he hath <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

And there shall be <S%H530>stability<s%> in thy <S%H6256>times<s%>, <S%H2633>abundance<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is thy <S%H214>treasure<s%>.
Behold <S%H691><s%>, their valiant ones <S%H6817>cry<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>; the <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly<s%>.

The <S%H4546>highways<s%> lie <S%H8074>waste<s%>, the wayfaring <S%H5674>man<s%> <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%>: the enemy hath <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, he hath <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, he <S%H2803>regardeth<s%> not <S%H582>man<s%>.

The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%> and <S%H535>languisheth<s%>; <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H2659>confounded<s%> and withereth <S%H7060>away<s%>; <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> is like a <S%H6160>desert<s%>; and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> shake off their <S%H5287>leaves<s%>.
Now will I <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; now will I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7426>myself<s%>; now will I be exalted.
Ye shall <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H2842>chaff<s%>, ye shall bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%>: your <S%H7307>breath<s%> is a <S%H784>fire<s%> that shall devour <S%H398>you<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall be as the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of <S%H7875>lime<s%>, as <S%H6975>thorns<s%> cut <S%H3683>down<s%>, that are <S%H3341>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye that are far <S%H7350>off<s%>, what I have <S%H6213>done<s%>; <S%H7138>and<s%>, ye that are near, <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H1369>might<s%>.

The <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H6342>afraid<s%>; <S%H6342>trembling<s%> hath <S%H270>seized<s%> the <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H1481>ones<s%>: Who among us can dwell with the <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>? who among us can <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4168>burnings<s%>?

He that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H6666>righteously<s%>, and <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly<s%>; he that <S%H3988>despiseth<s%> the <S%H1215>gain<s%> of <S%H4642>oppressions<s%>, that <S%H5287>shaketh<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> from <S%H8551>taking<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%>, that <S%H331>stoppeth<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> from <S%H8085>hearing<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H6105>shutteth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>looking<s%> upon <S%H7451>evil<s%>:

He shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>; his place of <S%H4869>defence<s%> shall be the <S%H4679>munitions<s%> of <S%H5553>rocks<s%>; his <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4325>him<s%>; his waters shall be <S%H539>sure<s%>.
Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in his <S%H3308>beauty<s%>: they shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that reacheth <S%H4801>afar<s%>.

Thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1897>muse<s%> on the <S%H367>terror<s%>: Where is he that <S%H5608>counted<s%>, where is he that <S%H8254>weighed<s%> the <S%H5608>tribute<s%>? where is he that counted the <S%H4026>towers<s%>?

Thou shalt not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3267>fierce<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>deep<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> that thou canst not <S%H8085>comprehend<s%>, of a <S%H3932>strange<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that thou canst not <S%H998>understand<s%>.

Look <S%H2372><s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> of our <S%H4150>solemnities<s%>: thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H7600>quiet<s%> <S%H5116>habitation<s%>, a <S%H168>tent<s%> that shall not be <S%H6813>removed<s%>, the <S%H3489>stakes<s%> whereof shall <S%H5331>never<s%> be <S%H5265>plucked<s%> <S%H2256>up<s%>, neither shall any of the cords thereof be <S%H5423>broken<s%>.

But there <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will be with us in <S%H117>majesty<s%>, a <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> and <S%H2975>streams<s%>, wherein shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H590>galley<s%> with <S%H7885>oars<s%>, neither shall <S%H117>gallant<s%> <S%H6716>ship<s%> pass <S%H5674>thereby<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is our <S%H8199>judge<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is our <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is our <S%H4428>king<s%>; he will save <S%H3467>us<s%>.

Thy <S%H2256>tacklings<s%> are <S%H5203>loosed<s%>; they could not <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3653>foot<s%> of their <S%H8650>mast<s%>, they could not <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H5251>sail<s%>: then was the <S%H5706>prey<s%> of a <S%H4766>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%>; the <S%H6455>lame<s%> <S%H962>took<s%> the <S%H957>prey<s%>.
And the <S%H7934>inhabitant<s%> shall not <S%H559>say<s%>, I am <S%H2470>sick<s%>: the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall be <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
